features.name: voting
features.title: Voting
features.description:
Viewers can add movies, games, or their own text as options.
Can be limited to subs/followers only.

features.name: chat-voting
features.title: Chat Voting
features.description: Viewers enter their options directly in the twitch chat. The streamer sees them on the site and can choose the winner.

features.name: chat-goal
features.title: Chat Goal
features.description:
Vote for or against until you get the required number of votes.
There is a widget for OBS.
